Rulings.Goat:
●Q: Can I activate “Painful Choice” and “Necrovalley” and still get all 5 pieces of Exodia? 
A: Painful Choice does not target a card or cards IN the GY, so it is legal to activate while “Necrovalley” in on the field. “Necrovalley” does not negate the requirements for discarding to the GY by cards like “Painful Choice”.  01/15/04
